title: Bans the sale, use or possession of 50-caliber weapons
summary: Bans the sale, use or possession of 50-caliber or larger weapons and directs the division of state police to embark on a program whereby persons currently in lawful possession of such weapons may be reimbursed for the fair market value thereof upon turning such weapons in to a designated officer.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the executive law, in relation to banning the sale, possession or use of 50-caliber weapons
